response:

Here is the list with my responses:

call you names - yuck

put down your friends - yuck
say things to scare you - yuck
make you do something embarrassing - yuck
encourage you to open up - attractive
open to your ideas - attractive
excited to see you - attractive
listen attentively to you - attractive
make an effort with your family - attractive

I hope we can have a conversation about why I chose these words. It's important to me that our relationship is built on mutual respect and trust.
